Adjusted Gross Income Data Set

Dimensions: 25545 observations x 77 variables

Link to metadata: <https://www.irs.gov/statistics/soi-tax-stats-county-data>

To navigate to each year's metadata expand block under **County, metropolitan and micropolitan data** labeled Tax years and click on year. Then scroll to the bottom of the directed page and click on County Income Data Users Guide and Record Layout to download.

Disaster Data Set

Dimensions: 67922 observations x 28 variables

Link to metadata: <https://www.fema.gov/openfema-data-page/disaster-declarations-summaries-v2>
